aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.description:
I've been working in the world of makeup since 2009. My career developed gradually‚Äîfrom being a makeup artist at a drugstore, to becoming a trainer and instructor, and finally working for prestigious makeup brands. I gained experience on TV sets, music videos, fashion shows, and as an instructor at a makeup school.
My years of experience led to the opening of my own studio, where I do special occasion makeup, provide one-on-one lessons, and train future makeup artists.

In my work, my priority is to bring out and emphasize natural beauty. Every client is an inspiration to me, and makeup is a tool for highlighting their uniqueness. I invite you to book my services ü§ç

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.description: Ready to enhance your natural beauty? Contact me to schedule your makeup session or to learn more about my services. I'm here to help you look and feel your absolute best for any occasion.

form.name: Name
form.messagePlaceholder: Tell me about your makeup needs and preferred appointment time

reviews.title: Client Reviews
reviews.description: See what our clients have to say about our services. We're proud of the positive feedback we receive from our satisfied customers.
